page.title: 14Mrs Jenkins - Council Clerk
page.content: Mrs.Jenkins works in a little office in the Memorial Hall in Lambourn,as the Clerk to the Parish Council.She has been with the Council for 5 yrs.She attends Parirh Meetings and writes down the Minutes.She keeps accounts for the Council and pays the wages of the employees.If anyone has a problem,she will try and sort it out.She writes to other councils to tell them the news.There aren't any discos held in the Hall as it is too small.She works in the mornings,six days a week.She is in charge of the allotments.The charges are Â£5 a yr.OAP's pay only Â£2.50.She oversees the Burial Ground in Upper Lambourn.She ensures the grass is kept tidy.The Parish Council represents the views of the local people.The Women's Institute,Magistrate Court,Sunday School,Baby Clinic are in the Hall.
